nodes.text: Kaiya Stas was a female Miraluka Jedi serving the Galactic Republic on the planet Hoth during the Cold War.

Around 3642 BBY Kaiya Stas was stationed on Hoth, trying to stop a legendary wampa called the White Terror. The wampa was on the rampage and threatened to devour an entire Ortolan colony. Injured during her hunt, Kaiya asked a Republic spacer for help. The hero lured White Terror out of its lair and killed the beast.

Kaiya Stas appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a quest-giver for the quest "I Came, I Froze, I...". The quest is available for any Republic character and its completion is optional. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means the quest is completed.
